definition: to lose weight (intentionally)/to slim down/(Tw) to downsize (a business)
thin/to lose weight/(of clothing) tight/(of meat) lean/(of land) unproductive
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: The most commonly asked question concerning cellulite is how to get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 关于瘦身，人们最常问到的问题就是如何消除脂肪。

sentences.english: I absolutely will not wear a tummy revealing shirt without slathering this stuff on first.
sentences.chinese: 现在我在穿腹部瘦身衣之前，一定要先涂这个东西的。

sentences.english: What do you think concerning our beloved teacher's (H'ng Siew Lee) successful slimming plan?
sentences.chinese: 你对我们敬爱的老师瘦身计划成功有着怎样的看法？

sentences.english: After taking the product, within one month weight-loss success.
sentences.chinese: 服用该产品后，一个月内胜利瘦身。

sentences.english: Today she is a slimming consultant.
sentences.chinese: 佐伊现在是一名瘦身顾问。

sentences.english: To do this successfully, you start small.
sentences.chinese: 要想成功瘦身，你就要从小处开始。

sentences.english: Promote circulation , the subtraction grease thereby thin body.
sentences.chinese: 从而促进循环，减脂瘦身。

sentences.english: In order to lose weight and let oneself hungry belly is not thin body effect.
sentences.chinese: 为了减肥而让自己饿肚子是没有瘦身效果的。

sentences.english: Logically then it would be clear that anti-cellulite creams will not be able to permanently remove cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 因此瘦身霜不具备永久消除脂肪的功效。

sentences.english: Do you feel pressure under the sliming culture?
sentences.chinese: 你认为瘦身文化有对你构成压力吗？

sentences.english: Do you accept others' Sliming Culture?
Lingzhi Detox Tea slimming effect with the double.
sentences.chinese: 配合灵芝排毒茶瘦身功效加倍。

sentences.english: They were also more likely to buy into the media’s thin ideal.
sentences.chinese: 同时，她们也更有可能被媒体宣传的瘦身理想所影响。

sentences.english: Avoid perpetuating the idea that a thin body is the only ideal.
sentences.chinese: 避免“瘦身是唯一理想”这种想法长期存在。

sentences.english: The little girl who tried hard to keep fit looked half-starved to me.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这个努力瘦身的小女孩太羸弱了。

sentences.english: The guilt has begun to kick in but it merely serves to gird my loins.
sentences.chinese: 负疚感又来了，但这只会有利我瘦身。

definition: to save food/to go on a diet
lit. shut your mouth, move your legs (motto for losing weight)
pinyin: guan3 zhu4 zui3 mai4 kai1 tui3

definition: to put on weight/to get fat
to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
thin/to lose weight/(of clothing) tight/(of meat) lean/(of land) unproductive
